definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: A new method of surface shape measurement of aspherical optical components.
sentences.chinese: 一種測量非球面光學零件面形的新方法。

sentences.english: Finally, an example of aspherical surface testing is given.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了一個非球面面形的測量例。

sentences.english: The methods for selecting penta prism and reducing the effect of surface profile error on detection are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了選擇五棱鏡的方法和減小面形誤差影響的方法。

sentences.english: Experimental results show that the system is feasible for changing the surface profiles of a membrane mirror.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，該系統可有效改變薄膜反射鏡的面形。

sentences.english: Absolute measurement and foundation of standard optical surface .
sentences.chinese: 標準光學面形的建立與絕對檢驗。

sentences.english: The real shape ofthe object can be obtained by subtracting the inclined surface.
sentences.chinese: 物體實際面形可以通過減去這個附加傾斜面而獲得。

sentences.english: A new method of three dimension shape measurement is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種測量三維面形的新方法。

sentences.english: In the condition of radial-oriented gravity, the surface-shape of the topological structure also meets the requirements of the design.
sentences.chinese: 在徑向重力工況下，拓撲優化結構也能滿足面形要求。

sentences.english: A new method of unwrapping for three-dimensional profilometry is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種可用於三維面形測量的新的去包裹方法。

sentences.english: Phase measurement profilometry is one of the important 3 D surface shape measuring methods.
sentences.chinese: 位相測量輪廓術是三維面形測量的一種重要方法。

sentences.english: The method on profile- control of micro- optic element in photoresist was presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了連續微光學元件在光刻膠上的面形控制方法。

definition: variant of 臉型|脸型, shape of face/physiognomy
